name: Trials of the Forest
description:
Become a full wizard by going through these trials. 

A game focused on exploration and action, just for PC.

You are a trainee wizard, and your name is Gomar. After going through many trials, lessons, and hardships, now you must pass these final lessons so you can finally unlock your wizard powers. 

Avoid or defend yourself from enemies and make your way to the endpoint of this journey.

"This is actually my first game so, there are some things that need work. Any feedback is welcome. Still, this was a great learning experience for me. Hope you like it!"
